page.title: 02Eurotherm International
page.content: Eurotherm deal in industrial electronics and have buildings all around the world.Eurotherm bought Leonardslee house because they needed a headquarters.They wanted an old house because they preferred it to a modern building.Mr Chessell told us that they use only half the rooms in the house because the other rooms need repairing.He also said that the cost to repair the house would be about Â£250,000.Mr Chessell told us that they would change the inside of the house but because it is a listed building they are not allowed to change the outside of it at all.He said that they own about four acres at Leonardslee but they also own 250,000 acres in factories.The cellar will be used for storing archives for up to five years and two of the downstairs rooms will be used for conferences.The job that
